title: Southwest Airlines Cancels Hundreds More Flights Following Weekend Disruption
sub_head: About 350 more flights canceled following 1,900 cancellations over the weekend due to air-traffic-control issues and severe weather
body:
Southwest Airlines Co. canceled hundreds of flights Monday as it continued to dig out from a weekend meltdown.
The carrier canceled nearly 350 flights Monday morning, about 9% of the airlineâ€™s schedule, according to FlightAware, a flight-tracking site. The cancellations build on the roughly 1,900 flights Southwest canceled Saturday and Sunday.
